children.value: the idea of entities which transform actions into other actions - expressed visually as

of other entities whose relative capacities for action and reaction, which, when thought of as constraints upon the causal paths that pass through a configuration space in which they are present, show themselves to be superadditive. Visual signifiers for such objects behave in analogy to the objects themselves, which was Klee's particular preoccupation.
